common.linkNotReliable: This link might be a hallucination from AI model and may not be reliable.

messageInput.placeholder: What can I do for you?
messageInput.placeholderWithRag:
What can I do for you? 
You may refer to RAG resources by using @.

hero.title: Deep Research at Your Fingertips
hero.description: Morgana is a personal deep-research companion—an orchestrated stack of agents that scouts sources, verifies claims, and assembles polished deliverables without the busywork.
hero.highlight2: Source-grounded briefs, timelines, and executive summaries
hero.highlight3: Human-in-the-loop controls whenever you want to steer

chatPreview.title: Watch Morgana spin up a new thread
chatPreview.userMessage: Map the funding landscape for climate-insurtech startups in LATAM.
chatPreview.assistantMessage: On it—pulling filings, investor notes, and competitive intel. I'll return a structured brief with citations, a pipeline timeline, and partnership leads.
chatPreview.hint: Tap to open the full research studio

hero.footnote: Built by Paul Okafor · Crafted for long-form thinking

settings.title: Morgana Settings
settings.mcpConfigDescription: Morgana uses the standard JSON MCP config to create a new server.
settings.pasteConfigBelow: Paste your config below and click "Add" to add new servers.

general.title: General
general.maxPlanIterationsDescription: Set to 1 for single-step planning. Set to 2 or more to enable re-planning.
general.maxStepsOfPlan: Max steps of a research plan
general.maxStepsDescription: By default, each research plan has 3 steps.
general.maxSearchResultsDescription: By default, each search step has 3 results.

mcp.title: MCP Servers
mcp.description: The Model Context Protocol boosts Morgana's capabilities by integrating external tools for tasks like private domain searches, web browsing, food ordering, and more. Click here to

reportStyle.chooseDesc: Select the writing style for your research reports. Different styles are optimized for different audiences and purposes.
reportStyle.academicDesc: Formal, objective, and analytical with precise terminology
reportStyle.popularScienceDesc: Engaging and accessible for general audience
reportStyle.newsDesc: Factual, concise, and impartial journalistic style
reportStyle.strategicInvestmentDesc: Deep, comprehensive analysis for strategic investment institutions with actionable insights

footer.quote: Originated from Open Source, give back to Open Source.

welcome.greeting: Set the stage for your next investigation
welcome.description: Pick a prompt to watch Morgana orchestrate an end-to-end research sprint, or drop your own challenge below.

conversationStarters: Draft a market brief on European battery-recycling startups, including leading players and regulatory headwinds.
Compare the expansion strategies of Uber Eats and DoorDash across Southeast Asia.
Outline a 30-day research roadmap for entering the precision agriculture market.
Summarize the latest breakthroughs in multimodal AI for enterprise customer support.

deepThinkingTooltip.title: Deep Thinking Mode: {status}
deepThinkingTooltip.description: When enabled, Morgana will use reasoning model ({model}) to generate more thoughtful plans.

investigationTooltip.title: Investigation Mode: {status}
investigationTooltip.description: When enabled, Morgana will perform a quick search before planning. This is useful for researches related to ongoing events and news.

research.errorExecutingCode: Error when executing the above code
research.errorGeneratingPodcast: Error when generating podcast. Please try again.

messages.replayDescription: Morgana is now replaying the conversation...
messages.replayModeDescription: You're now in Morgana's replay mode. Click the "Play" button on the right to start.
messages.demoNotice: * This site is for demo purposes only. If you want to try your own question, please
messages.cloneLocally: to clone it locally and run it.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.description: See Morgana in action through replays.

cases.title: How tall is Eiffel Tower compared to tallest building?
cases.description: The research compares the heights and global significance of the Eiffel Tower and Burj Khalifa, and uses Python code to calculate the multiples.

cases.title: What are the top trending repositories on GitHub?
cases.description: The research utilized MCP services to identify the most popular GitHub repositories and documented them in detail using search engines.

cases.title: Write an article about Nanjing's traditional dishes
cases.description: The study vividly showcases Nanjing's famous dishes through rich content and imagery, uncovering their hidden histories and cultural significance.

cases.title: How to decorate a small rental apartment?
cases.description: The study provides readers with practical and straightforward methods for decorating apartments, accompanied by inspiring images.

cases.title: Introduce the movie 'Léon: The Professional'
cases.description: The research provides a comprehensive introduction to the movie 'Léon: The Professional', including its plot, characters, and themes.

cases.title: How do you view the takeaway war in China? (in Chinese)
cases.description: The research analyzes the intensifying competition between JD and Meituan, highlighting their strategies, technological innovations, and challenges.

cases.title: Are ultra-processed foods linked to health?
cases.description: The research examines the health risks of rising ultra-processed food consumption, urging more research on long-term effects and individual differences.

cases.title: Write an article on "Would you insure your AI twin?"
cases.description: The research explores the concept of insuring AI twins, highlighting their benefits, risks, ethical considerations, and the evolving regulatory.

coreFeatures.title: Core Features
coreFeatures.description: Find out what makes Morgana effective.

features.name: Dive Deeper and Reach Wider
features.description: Unlock deeper insights with advanced tools. Our powerful search + crawling and Python tools gathers comprehensive data, delivering in-depth reports to enhance your study.

features.name: Human-in-the-loop
features.description: Refine your research plan, or adjust focus areas all through simple natural language.

features.name: Lang Stack
features.description: Build with confidence using the LangChain and LangGraph frameworks.

features.name: MCP Integrations
features.description: Supercharge your research workflow and expand your toolkit with seamless MCP integrations.

features.name: Podcast Generation
features.description: Instantly generate podcasts from reports. Perfect for on-the-go learning or sharing findings effortlessly.

multiAgent.title: Multi-Agent Architecture
multiAgent.description: Experience the agent teamwork with our Supervisor + Handoffs design pattern.

joinCommunity.title: Join the Morgana Community
joinCommunity.description: Contribute brilliant ideas to shape the future of Morgana. Collaborate, innovate, and make impacts.
